full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Vehicle Commercial/Heavy Truck Filters

#### Details

* **Tender Title**: Vehicle Commercial/Heavy Truck Filters: Fluid, Engine
* **Government Reference Number**: W8486-249110/AV
* **Announcement Date**: June 7, 2023
* **Tender Close Date**: August 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence seeks to establish a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the procurement of vehicle commercial/heavy truck filters. The offer is intended for delivery to the Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) Edmonton, Alberta, and the CFSD Montreal, Quebec.

#### Requirements

The following filters are required:

| Item Number | Product Description | Unit of Issue | Quantity |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Filter, Fluid, Part No.: 51748 (NCAGE: 79396 or 73370) | EA | 400 |
| 2 | Filter, Fluid, Part No.: HPH6349 (NCAGE: 73370) | EA | 300 |
| 3 | Filter Element, Fluid, Part No.: 24074 (NCAGE: 3305370 or 153434) | EA | 400 |
| 4 | Filter Element, Fluid, Part No.: 3305370 (NCAGE: 153434) | EA | 300 |
| 5 | Filter Element, Fluid, Part No.: FS2002200 (NCAGE: 33457 or 33457) | EA | 1000 |
| 6 | Filter Element, Fluid, Part No.: FS20022 (NCAGE: 33457) | EA | 600 |

#### Offer Specifications

* The offer will be valid for an initial period of two (2) years, with the option to extend for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.
* Bidders proposing alternative products must provide the brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.

#### Tender Submission

* Electronic submission of bids is required and must be sent via email.
* Details on electronic submission can be found in the solicitation document.

#### Supporting Documents

* Tender notice: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6251/w8486-249110-av_rfso_english_0.pdf>
* Amendment 1: <https://canadab
